name: Shape Fighter (lopar)
description:
Controls

Player 1:

  • WASD/Controller 1 DPad - Jump/Left/Down/Right
  • 123/Controller 1 AXY - Change shape

Player 2:

  • IJKL/Controller 2 DPad - Jump/Left/Down/Right
  • 123/Controller 2 AXY - Change shape
Goal

Boop the other player with the right shape! Triangle beats circle; circle beats square; square beats triangle. Same shape bounces off each other. Keep your own score, or whatever. Watch out, changing shapes has a short cooldown! Whatever happens though, I bet you'll be a-cute angle!

Credits

Made in 4-5ish hours for Low Effort Jam 7

LoparPanda - Code, Graphics, Sound FX

vU_Vu - musics!

Lopar's chat - tons of great ideas (and even a few less great ideas!)

Development streamed live @ https://twitch.tv/loparpanda
